article_title: Pickup ends up on side after sliding on snowy Waldoboro road — Midcoast — Bangor Daily News — BDN Maine
article_text:
WALDOBORO, Maine — A pickup truck wound up on its side after its operator lost control in the slushy snow on Thursday morning, according to Waldoboro Police Officer Larry Hesseltine.

Johnny Murray, 20, of Waldoboro was southbound on Route 220 when he lost control of the vehicle due to the road conditions, Hesseltine said.

The truck rolled up on its side near 2668 Washington Road, and Murray was uninjured in the crash, Hesseltine said.
